text: saqtyamaqnayO#rEqvainaqM prati# ShThApayatiq nA&&*rtiqmArcCa#tyaddhvaqryurna yaja#mAnOq varu#NOq vA EqSha yaja#mAnamaqByaitiq yadaqgnirupa#naddhaq OSha#dhayaqH prati# gRuhNItAqgnimEqta-mityA#haq SAntyaiq vyasyaqn viSvAq ama#tIqrarA#tIq-rityA#haq rakSha#sAqmapa#hatyai niqShIda#n nOq apa# durmaqti(gm) ha#naqdityA#haq prati#ShThityAq OSha#dhayaqH prati#mOdaddhva - [  ] 29
